title: 曼聯個新援阿fred訓練果陣 比卡斯米路整傷

replies.msg:
Manchester United’s new signing Fred has picked up an injury while training with Brazil ahead of the World Cup.

The 25-year-old, who agreed a £52million move to Old Trafford from Shakhtar Donetsk earlier this week, was seen receiving medical treatment during Brazil’s latest session.

Fred appeared to sustain the injury to his right ankle after tangling with Casemiro and was pictured grimacing in pain as it was iced and strapped up.

Manchester United will be worried to see their new signing pick up such a problem, with the Brazilian midfielder’s World Cup now in doubt.

Take a look through the gallery above to see the worrying pictures as Fred picks up an injury during Brazil training.
